website_summaries.verdict: Some shavers with sensitive skin may prefer the soothing, cooling effect of a gel-based aftershave balm, not a splash or traditional lotion. We love the salon-level ingredient list at a department store price point.
pros: Natural mint provides cooling effect, not alcohol
Fragrance is described as pleasant, but not overpowering
cons: Very thick, hair gel-like consistency that lingers on skin

customer_reviews.title: Too Much Hype, but...
customer_reviews.text: This product is hyped to such a nauseating level that I'm reluctant to review it. And, it's overpriced. BUT -- it actually DOES help soothe a razor burn. It's not an earth-shaking effect, but it helps. Then, after a few hours, I have to go wash my face to get the Sticky off. Where it comes in handy is when I have to shave twice in the same day -- I don't like to Scruff-up a Lady's face (or other body parts), and my stubble grows out very quickly. So, for those late evening dates, it's the sticky stuff to the rescue. I'd use it more often if it wasn't sticky and so overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Harold T. Read

customer_reviews.title: Thick and very cooling
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this after shave. But, after going through the entire tube, I don't think I'd buy another one. I mean, it's OK, and others may surely like it more than I did. For me, it's just too thick - it comes out like hair gel, and I feel like I have to wash my hands after I use it. It's strongly menthol - bracing in the morning, for sure. It's also really expensive, especially given how it dumps out of the tube. It's a decent aftershave; you can do far worse. I also find that, for me, I can do better as well.
customer_reviews.author: Luc S

customer_reviews.title: Billy Jealousy Shaved Ice After-Shave Balm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this aftershave balm because it had won a number of awards given out by Men's Health Magazine and I can see why! This balm smells great, and absorbs quickly and cools and sooths my face after shaving. The scent is citrus. The company donates a portion of its profits to what they call "Human needs- the environment and the arts." Nothing wrong with that! The seller Luxury4Him was unbelievable and they only took three days to deliver after my order, and the shipping/handling was free. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: bigguy11

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel like ice on my face but does feel good.
customer_reviews.text: I also use the shave gel from Billy Jealousy and adding this product in line makes the shave experience just splendid. Don't need much of this product to do the job, so don't be miffed about the size of the container when you get it. I like the fact there isn't really much of an odor to it, some of the products out there make it seem like you just got done rubbing some element of the outdoors all across your face, this soothes and leaves you feeling like you won't attract the wildlife. Good on you Billy.
customer_reviews.author: captnd

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on the skin! Pricy, but makes a nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: I can see why Men's Magazine rated this price little item, "Best Splurge". It's great after a hot shower and shave to remoisturize your face. The "icy" sensation it leaves behind is slightly stinging, but refreshing (it won't cause severe pain like some cheaper antishaves with higher alcohol contents). Excellent for sanitizing shaved skin and preventing "shaving pimples" from popping up. Would definitely recommend as a gift for a boyfriend/husband. 3oz isn't much for the price, but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Arra

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I used a different skin care line for years, and recently tried just the hydroplane shave cream, and now I use the full Billy Jealousy line. Trust me, this is great stuff. I have super sensitive skin, and after I shave- no nicks,cuts, or irritation. If it works for me, I'm sure it would probably work for you. And not to stray from the point, but Gillette fusion pro glide is the best razor there is- trust me again, I've tried them all. And no, I don't get a commission if you buy that razor- LOL
customer_reviews.author: texasguy

customer_reviews.title: The Cold Shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Billy Jealousy has a "bad boy" reputation. That must mean, "Boy, this stuff hurts badly." Shaved Ice contains some good stuff -- aloe and oils -- but it burned my face. I was tired of going to work with the dry, burning sensation that B.J.S.I causes, so I discarded the remaining 60 percent left in my bottle. It clearly is a well-regarded product line, but it is no good for my sensitive skin. I'll look elsewhere for a good after-shave balm.
customer_reviews.author: Pard

customer_reviews.title: The Best After-Shave! Period.
customer_reviews.text: Having tried just about every other aftershave product on the market with little luck, I stumbled onto Billy Jealousy after reading the reviews here on Amazon. I gave the Shaved Ice Balm a chance a year ago and have never looked back. This is the only aftershave that leaves me without bumps or irritation. The more you use it, the better your skin feels and appears. Although costly, it is well worth it as you will avoid the irritation that comes from shaving.
customer_reviews.author: tpwoofs

customer_reviews.title: Feels great after a shave
customer_reviews.text: This stuff feels great after a shave. It's probably the most refreshing after shave I've used. I tried this after using the Billy Jealousy Shave Cream (which is the best shave cream I've ever used). Highly recommended. I follow up with the Billy Jealousy Combination Code Moisturizer. It's a great combination (with a Mach 3 power razor) and I no longer get any nicks or bleed, even when shaving in dry environments like Phoenix or Vegas.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Loved the scent. Loved the way it lubricates and glides on the skin Definitely RECOMMEND this!!
customer_reviews.author: REEree

customer_reviews.title: Good, Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I like the product for a light morning moisturizer. The cooling that is heavily promoted is just hyperbole to me - I couldn't recommend it if cooling is high on your list. If it were less expensive I would use it as a daily moisturizer. As it is, I will finish what I have a look for a less expensive option.
customer_reviews.author: J. Christie

customer_reviews.title: To Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for a good after shave cream. Came across this brand at Ulta. They had other Billy Jealousy products but were out of the after shave balm. I found it online and read a lot of the reviews. A lot of good reviews and a few bad ones. I decided to give it a try. While it doesn't have a lot of alcohol the mint provides a cooling effect. I thought it was ok but will likely keep searching for a good after shave that is fragrance free. And one that doesn't cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: Gay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and really helps.
customer_reviews.text: I have some thick facial hair and my entire life shaving has been a PITA. But this stuff helps me and has cleared my complexion up considerably. I use after I shave AND I use it every time I get out of the shower. Just be prepared for your lips to be numb and if your honey nibbles, so will her lips.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: refreshing for quite some time after my shave and soothing to my sensitive skin, which has calmed down after a few weeks of razor burn following my switch from electric to blade shaving. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: A post shave must
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome post shave, I hate shaving when I don't have this product with me. Very cooling, refreshing, leaves the skin feeling cool and tight.

customer_reviews.title: Change of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Billy Jealousy fan so probably a bit biased but I'm sold on Shaved Ice After Shave Balm. It really does feel "cool" to the skin after shaving. Little pricey and goes fast but what can I say: I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Sezwhom

customer_reviews.title: awesome

I used to work in cosmetics,and this was actually recommended to me to use for razor burn(yes, this is safe for the bikini area), but I ended up buying it for my husband, whose neck is always irritated after shaving, and he swears by it. It calms the skin almost immediately and is now a staple in his morning routine. He has tried many products in the past, and none have worked as effectively as this one.

customer_reviews.title: Electric razors always caused visable and painful harm to my face until I used his shaving ...

customer_reviews.title: One slick shave
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth on the skin and it is a great follow up to a close shave. A quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Not like shaved ice

In fact, it doesn't seem any cooler than other much less expensive brands typically purchased at most stores. I will not order this product again.

customer_reviews.text: Premium shaving products are often not worth the money. This one along with some of my Truefit and Hill are '''''. My skin is moisturized and all cuts closed in a couple of minutes. It delivers. Order it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed. This bottle lasts approximately 4-5 months, so don't worry about high cost. Drys quick and leaves skin smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. The balm does have a cool sensation, but the citrus smell is wonderful. Given the lower price than department store balms, I was expecting to have to use more of it for each application. Not the case. It is indeed less expensive per application. I will use other balms to get variety, but Billy Jealousy Shaved Ice will continue to be part of my rotation.

customer_reviews.title: I think you'll like it too

customer_reviews.title: This is really great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this aftershave. It's soothing for both nicks and ingrown hairs. And while it has a nice cooling effect, it doesn't leave you smelling like an Aqua Velva man the rest of the day. I'll even use this on days I don't shave, as it's also an excellent moisturizer.

customer_reviews.title: Great after-shave lotion
customer_reviews.text: I love hour cool and smooth my face feels after I use Billy Jealousy's Shaved Ice. My skin doesn't burn anymore post-shave and I don't have anymore red splotches. It's a bit expensive for an aftershave lotion, but feel it is worth it. I'd definitely recommend trying it as a part of your shaving routine.

customer_reviews.title: What an incredible after shave!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It is the perfect ending to my shaving routine. It has a wonderful, cooling sensation that helps to even out and moisturize my face after i shave. I have got all my friends hooked on this product and they all love it as much as i do. It does exactly what it says and is pure shaved ice with no typical after shave balm burn. My skin has never looked or felt better due to this line of skincare. Take my advice, try their whole line of products. You will feel energized and everyone will notice the difference. Thanks, Billy!!

customer_reviews.title: NO DOUBT  - Best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Surfing and sun has certainly not helped my skin, however, this product sure makes my face feel cool and keeps it moisturized all day long without being greasy. Most other after shave balms I've tried left my skin feeling greasy or would simply not moisturize or cool my face longer than an hour or so after shaving. I use this every morning and it lasts all day long. Makes my lady appreciate my face against her skin as well! Will be trying more Billy Jealousy products......

customer_reviews.text: One of the best after shave balms I have ever used. goes on smooth and cool. Only need a little and it goes a long way. I highly recommend this.

customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of premium products but I like this the best. It quickly cools and moisturizes my skin after shaving. It really feels like the cool rush you see on those Dentyne Ice commercials. I love it.

product_meta.title: Billy Jealousy Shaved Ice After-Shave Balm, 3 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
It's not wise to leave the house hot and bothered. Cool down with our award-winning Shaved Ice Mens After-Shave Balm, a unique combination of skin-cooling ingredients that provide long-lasting soothing effects. Our blend of aloe moisturizes and restores pH balance, while allantoin promotes healing and blocks pain from shaving irritation. Leaves skin hydrated, smooth and comfortable for that perfect freshly shaved feeling.

SINCE 2004, BILLY JEALOUSY HAS BECOME AN ICON IN THE GROOMING INDUSTRY FOR AWARD-WINNING, CRUELTY-FREE FORMULAS.
Since 2004, Billy Jealousy has become an icon in the grooming industry for award-winning, cruelty-free formulas.
